title: cardinal-app
description: Life dashboard and automation tool designed to centralize personal productivity systems and automate routine tasks.
details:
Key features:

  • Customizable dashboard with widgets for different productivity systems
  • Task management with priority-based scheduling
  • API integrations with calendar, email, and note-taking apps
  • Automated routine generation based on schedule and priorities
  • Data visualization for productivity metrics

Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Local Storage API
